name: Magic Alchemist Halloween
description:
Halloween Edition of Magic Alchemist!

On your journey to become the most famous and glorious alchemist you have to merge objects until you discover the final and most mysterious Halloween object!

Magic Alchemist Halloween is an easy to learn game but nonetheless challenging. A fantastic Halloween game for hours of fun and creeps!

This version is free of advertising. The ad-supported version is called "Magic Alchemist Halloween Edition"

* same gameplay rules as the original Magic Alchemist
* creepy Halloween graphics
* addictive gameplay
* intuitive touchscreen controls
* weird visual effects
* spooky Halloween music
* scary Halloween sound effects
* local highscores for your device
* global highscores for all versions of Magic Alchemist
* leave the game anytime and continue your session later
* Halloween game!
* creeps!
* All Hallows' Eve!
* of course with pumpkins

If you have suggestions for the Halloween Magic Alchemist or if you experience a problem please write to me: erdenkriecher@online.de.
